coreAtributes.authorTag: A small tag sewn into the side seam reads "Official Enforcer Issue, MFD by DSG Threadworks."
coreAtributes.name: waistcoat
coreAtributes.description: A waistcoat with two pockets that serves as the regulation alternative for Enforcers whose arms cannot fit into the regular dress uniform coat.

sticker.descriptionModification: This one has the insignia of a Police Constable attached to it.
sticker.unavailabilityText: #IF(pc.getOccupation() != OCCUPATION_NPC_ENFORCER_PATROL_CONSTABLE || pc.getOccupation() != OCCUPATION_NPC_ENFORCER_SWORD_CONSTABLE || pc.getOccupation() != OCCUPATION_NPC_ENFORCER_ORICL_CONSTABLE) Only Enforcers who hold a rank of Police Constables can use these collar tabs! #ENDIF
sticker.availabilityText: As an Enforcer who holds the rank of Police Constable, you can freely use these collar tabs.

sticker.descriptionModification: This one has the insignia of a Sergeant attached to it.
sticker.unavailabilityText: #IF(pc.getOccupation() != OCCUPATION_NPC_ENFORCER_PATROL_SERGEANT || pc.getOccupation() != OCCUPATION_NPC_ENFORCER_SWORD_SERGEANT || pc.getOccupation() != OCCUPATION_NPC_ENFORCER_ORICL_SERGEANT) Only Enforcers who hold a rank of Sergeant can use this insignia! #ENDIF
sticker.availabilityText: As an Enforcer who holds the rank of Sergeant, you can freely use these collar tabs.

sticker.descriptionModification: This one has the insignia of an Inspector attached to it.
sticker.unavailabilityText: #IF(pc.getOccupation() != OCCUPATION_NPC_ENFORCER_PATROL_INSPECTOR || pc.getOccupation() != OCCUPATION_NPC_ENFORCER_SWORD_INSPECTOR || pc.getOccupation() != OCCUPATION_NPC_ENFORCER_ORICL_INSPECTOR) Only Enforcers who hold a rank of Inspector can use these collar tabs! #ENDIF
sticker.availabilityText: As an Enforcer who holds the rank of Inspector, you can freely use these collar tabs.

sticker.descriptionModification: This one has the insignia of a Superintendent attached to it.
sticker.unavailabilityText: #IF(true) Only Enforcers who hold a rank of Superintendent can use these collar tabs! #ENDIF
sticker.availabilityText: As an Enforcer who holds the rank of Superintendent, you can freely use these collar tabs.

sticker.descriptionModification: This one has the insignia of a Chief Superintendent attached to it.
sticker.unavailabilityText: #IF(true) Only Enforcers who hold a rank of Chief Superintendent can use these collar tabs! #ENDIF
sticker.availabilityText: As an Enforcer who holds the rank of Chief Superintendent, you can freely use these collar tabs.

sticker.unavailabilityText: #IF(pc.getOccupation() != OCCUPATION_NPC_ENFORCER_PATROL_CONSTABLE || pc.getOccupation() != OCCUPATION_NPC_ENFORCER_SWORD_CONSTABLE || pc.getOccupation() != OCCUPATION_NPC_ENFORCER_ORICL_CONSTABLE) Only Enforcers who hold a rank of Police Constable can use this name plate! #ENDIF
sticker.availabilityText: As an Enforcer who holds the rank of Police Constable, you can freely use this name plate.

sticker.unavailabilityText: #IF(pc.getOccupation() != OCCUPATION_NPC_ENFORCER_PATROL_SERGEANT || pc.getOccupation() != OCCUPATION_NPC_ENFORCER_SWORD_SERGEANT || pc.getOccupation() != OCCUPATION_NPC_ENFORCER_ORICL_SERGEANT) Only Enforcers who hold a rank of Sergeant can use this name plate! #ENDIF
sticker.availabilityText: As an Enforcer who holds the rank of Sergeant, you can freely use this name plate.

sticker.unavailabilityText: #IF(pc.getOccupation() != OCCUPATION_NPC_ENFORCER_PATROL_INSPECTOR || pc.getOccupation() != OCCUPATION_NPC_ENFORCER_SWORD_INSPECTOR || pc.getOccupation() != OCCUPATION_NPC_ENFORCER_ORICL_INSPECTOR) Only Enforcers who hold a rank of Inspector can use this name plate! #ENDIF
sticker.availabilityText: As an Enforcer who holds the rank of Inspector, you can freely use this name plate.

sticker.unavailabilityText: #IF(true) Only Enforcers who hold a rank of Superintendent can use this name plate! #ENDIF
sticker.availabilityText: As an Enforcer who holds the rank of Superintendent, you can freely use this name plate.

sticker.unavailabilityText: #IF(true) Only Enforcers who hold a rank of Chief Superintendent can use this name plate! #ENDIF
sticker.availabilityText: As an Enforcer who holds the rank of Chief Superintendent, you can freely use this name plate.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(put)] [npc.her] arms through the waistcoat's arm holes and [npc.verb(button)] up the front.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(help)] [npc2.name] [npc2.verb(put)] [npc2.her] arms through the waistcoat's arm holes and [npc.verb(button)] up the front.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(force)] [npc2.namePos] arms through the waistcoat's arm holes and hastily [npc.verb(button)] up the front.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unbutton)] the front of [npc.her] waistcoat and [npc.verb(pull)] [npc.her] arms out of the arm holes.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unbutton)] the front of [npc2.namePos] waistcoat and [npc.verb(help)] [npc2.her] [npc2.verb(pull)] [npc2.her] arms out of the arm holes.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pop)] open the buttons on the front of [npc2.namePos] waistcoat and roughly [npc.verb(pull)] [npc2.her] arms out of the arm holes.

replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] hastily [npc.verb(button)] up the front of [npc2.namePos] waistcoat.
